column72: SBS Friction udvikler, producerer og sælger bremseklodser og friktionsmaterialer til motorcykler, scootere, motorsport samt en række specialområder, herunder vindmøller. Produkterne sælges globalt, både til OE- og eftermarkedet. SBS Friction er hjemmehørende i Svendborg og beskæftiger ca. 80 medarbejdere. Virksomheden er en division i SBS-koncernen.

Produkterne sælges globalt, både til OE- og eftermarkedet. SBS Friction er hjemmehørende i Svendborg og beskæftiger ca. 80 medarbejdere. Virksomheden er en division i SBS-koncernen.
column100:
- MC parts programmes and approvals 
   
 Are you a structured person, with expertise in spare parts and data management? Are you thrilled by the thought of working for one of the most respected automotive groups worldwide in their profitable Danish business unit? And are you an excellent communicator internally and externally who achieves results through a persistent focus on tasks and projects? If yes, it could be just you to become our new Data Enrichment Specialist!  
   
 SBS Friction has a turnover of +20M EUR annually, and we are known and respected in the industry for quality and innovation, including environmentally friendly brake pads. We offer you an exciting and very independent work environment with a high degree of team spirit. At SBS Friction, our communication is both informal and precise at the same time. Most of our employees are interested in motorcycles and if you are too, then you will definitely feel at home with us. Otherwise, you will be thrilled by our LEAN working principles and target oriented working methods. 
   
 Your tasks 
 
 Updating and maintaining application data - adding new MCs in our Perfion PIM system 
 Product creation in PIM and D365 ERP system 
 Extract application lists for our customers with new models/additions 
 Ensure compliance with "SBS related products" for both SBS and OE products 
 Responsible for product approvals in accordance with Applicable ECE R90 legislation 
 Update cross-lists and match-up to competing products 
 Coordinate problem solving and development with our PIM system supplier 
 Handle projects from start to finish – coordinating across many different resources and domains 
 Ad hoc tasks as part of the marketing department in SBS Friction 
 
   
 Your profile/qualifications 
 
 Minimum 3 years of experience from the MC/Automotive spare parts industry and good results 
 Skills in PIM or database systems systems 
 Preferably enthusiastic MC rider! 
 Structured and engaged way of working – with a high energy level 
 Experience with project management is a requirement 
 Open, honest, clear, and direct communication – we expect you to have a good sense of humour! 
 Interest in developing .net or other programming skills (we will provide courses) 
 English on negotiation level and preferably also Italian, French, or German 
 
   
 SBS Friction offers work in a company with a high drive and the opportunity for personal development. If the above matches your profile and interest, please contact our HR Partner Proces Support A/S, Per Schorling, on +45 2332 5825 for an immediate assessment of your profile in relation to the job or find more information about SBS Friction on our  homepage . 
   
 Upload your application and CV (both in English) online on this page. 
 All applications are guaranteed full confidentiality. 
   
 Deadline for application:  We employ the right candidate, when found, so apply quickly! 
   
 Visit us on Facebook  here  or se videos about SBS Friction  here  – incl. a video of our production. 
   
 SBS Friction A/S is a globally leading manufacturer of brake pads for motorcycles and other segments with a full supply chain in Denmark. We are part of the Brembo Group with more than 11,000 employees worldwide and a turnover of 2.2 billion EUR. SBS Friction is well-known and recognized within its industry for quality and innovation, and we always employ the best and most qualified employees for the tasks and challenges we face.  
   
 We operate globally, so it’s important that our employees think and act internationally with an understanding and respect for other cultures. Focus areas for SBS employees are Lean, IT and co-operation. All employees work cross-organizationally. SBS recruits employees, who, aside from professional qualifications, show goal-orientation, hard work, commitment, co-operation and “team spirit”.
